query:
SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, g.id as gestor_id
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE u.email LIKE '%marco%' OR u.name LIKE '%Marco%';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2rEtBRZHWZUfGJS.3b07a01772f8 --database 3c9MozLH35e233uWy5WDtH --execute SELECT u.id, u.name, u.email, u.role, g.id as gestor_id
FROM users u 
LEFT JOIN gestores g ON g.userId = u.id
WHERE u.email LIKE '%marco%' OR u.name LIKE '%Marco%';
